page.title: 13Tilstock Parish Council.
page.content: Tilstock Parish Council is part of Whitchurch Rural Council and is one of two wards the other being Ash. Five members are elected from each ward.The present Chairman is Mr.Lewis and the Vice Chairman is Mr.Dorey.The aim of the council is to promote the well being of the area,supporting plans and schemes which are to the benefit of allthe inhabitants.Of particular concern at present is the traffic passing through the village,which being unrestricted is particulary dangerous to children and older residents.(See separate report under Events.)
